memberdef.argsstring: (const Model &model, const Traversal &traversal, const FreeFloatingPos &robotPos, const FreeFloatingVel &robotVel, const FreeFloatingAcc &robotAcc, const LinAcceleration &gravity, const LinkNetExternalWrenches &externalWrenches, FreeFloatingAcc &buf_properRobotAcc, LinkPositions &buf_linkPos, LinkVelArray &buf_linkVel, LinkAccArray &buf_linkProperAcc, LinkInternalWrenches &buf_internalWrenches, FreeFloatingGeneralizedTorques &buf_outputTorques, SensorsMeasurements &predictedMeasurement)
memberdef.name: predictSensorsMeasurements

briefdescription.para: Predict the measurement of a set of sensors.

detaileddescription.para: Given a SensorList object describing a list of sensor of a model fill the output argument predictedMeasurement with the predicted measurement of the sensors consistent with the state and the acceleration/torques and forces of the Model.
This function takes in input the internal buffers used for the computation to avoid dynamic memory allocation.

parameterdescription.para: the model used to predict the sensor measurements.
the sensors list used to predict the sensors measurements.
the Traversal used for predict the sensor measurements.
the position of the model used for prediction.
the velocity of the model used for prediction.
the acceleration of the model used for prediction.
the gravity acceleration (in world frame) used for prediction.
the net external wrench acting on each link.
internal buffer, storing the proper acceleration of the model.
internal buffer, storing the position of every link in the model.
internal buffer, storing the velocity of every link in the model.
internal buffer, storing the proper acceleration of every link in the model.
internal buffer, storing the internal wrenches.
internal buffer, storing the generalized joint torques.
the predicted measurements for the sensors.

simplesect.para: true if the sensors in the list are all valid

memberdef.argsstring: (const Model &model, const Traversal &traversal, const LinkVelArray &buf_linkVel, const LinkAccArray &buf_linkProperAcc, const LinkInternalWrenches &buf_internalWrenches, SensorsMeasurements &predictedMeasurement)
memberdef.name: predictSensorsMeasurementsFromRawBuffers

briefdescription.para: Predict the measurement of a set of sensors.

detaileddescription.para: Helper function that works on buffers already compute with Dynamics functions

parameterdescription.para: the model used to predict the sensor measurements.
the Traversal used for predict the sensor measurements.
internal buffer, storing the velocity of every link in the model.
internal buffer, storing the proper acceleration of every link in the model.
internal buffer, storing the internal wrenches.
the predicted measurements for the sensors.

simplesect.para: true if the sensors in the list are all valid

memberdef.argsstring: ("Deprecated function, please use the version in which SensorsList is " "passed via iDynTree::Model") bool predictSensorsMeasurements(const Model &model

param.type: please use the version in which SensorsList is " "passed via iDynTree::Model"

briefdescription.para: Predict the measurement of a set of sensors.

detaileddescription.para: Given a SensorList object describing a list of sensor of a model fill the output argument predictedMeasurement with the predicted measurement of the sensors consistent with the state and the acceleration/torques and forces of the Model.
This function takes in input the internal buffers used for the computation to avoid dynamic memory allocation.

model
the model used to predict the sensor measurements.
sensorList
the sensors list used to predict the sensors measurements.
traversal
the Traversal used for predict the sensor measurements.
robotPos
the position of the model used for prediction.
robotVel
the velocity of the model used for prediction.
robotAcc
the acceleration of the model used for prediction.
gravity
the gravity acceleration (in world frame) used for prediction.
externalWrenches
the net external wrench acting on each link.
buf_properRobotAcc
internal buffer, storing the proper acceleration of the model.
buf_linkPos
internal buffer, storing the position of every link in the model.
buf_linkVel
internal buffer, storing the velocity of every link in the model.
buf_linkProperAcc
internal buffer, storing the proper acceleration of every link in the model.
buf_internalWrenches
internal buffer, storing the internal wrenches.
buf_outputTorques
internal buffer, storing the generalized joint torques.
predictedMeasurement
the predicted measurements for the sensors.
true if the sensors in the list are all valid
